fields.headline: Smells like GOP dispirit
fields.bodyText: You can't tell everything from the size and enthusiasm on display in final-weekend rallies, but you can tell something. This Kos diary about a pretty lame-o sounding McCain rally in Columbus today may be instructive. Main takeaway: At a similar rally at the same 20,000-seat arena in 2004, George Bush filled the place and the crowd was totally revved up. Today, McCain had maybe 6,000.
